description: A column by Adam Liptak, the Supreme Court correspondent of The New York Times, that covers and considers developments in the world of law.
title: U.S.
text:
Image
Ruth Bader Ginsburg Bemoans a ‘Divisive’ Term, but Vows to Stick Around
In an annual summary of the Supreme Court’s work, Justice Ginsburg, 85, said she hoped for more consensus and may try to serve until she is 90.
